channel.title: KaTeX on Adrian's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in KaTeX on Adrian's Blog

item.title: TeX Support in Hugo
item.description: In this article I want to show how you can add TeX code in your Hugo website. Chances are that you are already familiar with Hugo and how it works. If you are not, that’s no problem. This is an example: $$\int \frac{1}{x-2}$$
